description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of King Guion, between 1938 and 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 539 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Guion, King Jazz musicians--1930-1950. Saxophonists--1930-1950. Women jazz musicians--1930-1950. Jazz singers--1930-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1930-1950. Cityscape photographs--1930-1950. Film negatives--1930-1950. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig...
